ygData.subject: Re: Magician & Necromancers...
ygData.msgSnippet: Definitly..High Elf Wizard pretty much sux as most its points going into chraisma when u can use for other stuff..DarkElf Magiccasters Rulez..High AGL,DEX and
ygData.messageBody:
Definitly..High Elf Wizard pretty much sux as most its points going into chraisma when u can use for other stuff..DarkElf Magiccasters Rulez..High AGL,DEX and looks cool :P.The faction thingy can be crossed just by using agnostic[wont KOS liao]then kill abt 100orcs[buy stuff from merchants]

Gnome also can but it look so .......
If u want to buy stuff cheap,u can do it w/o high charisma,create a secondary chr and pump its charisma to fullest then use the guy to buy things for ya this chr lor..hehe

-----Original Message-----
From: Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy <sccheng@...>
To: SG-Everquest Mailing List <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, June 17, 1999 8:10 AM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Magician & Necromancers...


ive read up some papers (YES! i forgot which one, so dont ask me)... that Varent has more surprises fer Magician than what we have seen.... i suppose some 'hidden' spells... or some boost fer em at some stages... but then... thast a paper fer mages... so i suppose they wanted to encourage more folks to take up as i believe there r only a small community playing em... ALSO, i believe.. necros, enchanters, or wizard should have that kinda stuff as well... its just a different quest... or just somewhere u have to go... or something u have to do... BUT nevertheless... that has somewhat encouraged me to take up the mage... instead of sticking with the necro... since u guys r all soooooooooooooooooooooooooooo 'holy'... i guess it will take ages b4 my necro can venture with u guys... so a mage might be a better choice... YES! a High Elf Mage :) any comments on that?

cheers,
Fred
